attribution: Designed by the Day 1B players at Magnum Opus
stripped_text: As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must trash 1 agenda from their score area. Ignore this ability if the Runner made a successful run on HQ this turn. Limit 1 per deck.
text:
As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must trash 1 agenda from their score area. Ignore this ability if the Runner made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Limit 1 per deck.
title: Hired Help
